description: Acne Vulgaris is a common skin condition that occurs when hair follicles become clogged with oil and dead skin cells. It often results in pimples, blackheads, and whiteheads on the face, neck, chest, and back.
treatments: Topical creams containing benzoyl peroxide or salicylic acid
Prescription medications like retinoids or antibiotics
Lifestyle changes such as proper skincare routine and diet
